source.d5d5414a:
# Only keep relevant columns from the IMDb dataset to avoid duplication.
imdb_df = imdb_df[['title', 'original_air_date', 'imdb_rating', 'total_votes', 'desc']]

community_df = episodes_df.merge(imdb_df, how='left', on=['title', 'original_air_date'])

community_df.head()
source.856f0d4b:
sns.lmplot(x="episode_num_overall", y="imdb_rating", hue="season", data=community_df, height=6, aspect=2, ci=None)
plt.xlabel("Episode")
plt.ylabel("IMDb Rating")
plt.title("IMDb Ratings for Community episodes")
source.b3f1ea0a:
best_director = community_df.groupby('directed_by')['imdb_rating'].agg(['mean', 'count']).sort_values(by='mean')

# combine the director names with their episode counts
labels = ['{} ({})'.format(name, best_director.loc[name, 'count']) for name in best_director.index]
best_director.index = labels

best_director.plot(kind='barh', figsize=(14,10), y='mean', legend=False,
                   title="Community Directors by Average IMDb Rating")
source.63d9c5a6: ### Which seasons have the highest IMDb ratings?
source.f9e960e9:
### Load and Merge the episode data and IMDb ratings files
A short example notebook to show how to load and merge the data from the two files in the Community dataset. The common columns are Title and Air Date.
source.227eec58: Jeff Melman has the highest rating for directing only one (excellent) season 3 episode, [Remedial Chaos Theory](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Remedial_Chaos_Theory). Not surprisingly, one of the Russo brothers (Joe) is the top director with more than 10 episodes. He directed 20 episodes by himself (plus the pilot with his brother) for an average rating over 8.0.
source.863302dc: ### Who is the fan-favorite Community director?
source.9915d5dc: It's clear that fans of the show liked the first three seasons the most. Season 4 was when a lot of the creative team started to leave the show, including series creator and showrunner [Dan Harmon](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dan_Harmon) and two the primary directors during the early seasons, the [Russo brothers](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russo_brothers). It's also when the first regular cast member, [Chevy Chase](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chevy_Chase), would leave the show, followed by [Donald Glover](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Donald_Glover) in season 5. Season 6 starts out with among the lowest ratings, but the series does finish relatively strong.
